title: Bihar Police Constable Admit Card
description: CSBC Bihar Police Constable Exam City / Admit Card 2025 Post Update Date: 09-07-2025 Short Details: Bihar Police Constable Admit Card 2025: CSBC Bihar Police Constable Admit Card 2025 has been released on official website @https://csbc.bih.nic.in/ and Bihar Police Constable Exam Date is 16/07/2025 to 03/08/2025 for 19838 Post whose, candidates who applied for the job of Bihar Police Constable Recruitment 2025 can download their admit card.
